segments.text: Hello , Jack . It's Mary . What are you doing in your office ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am working . I often work late on Thursdays . I am busy this week .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Would you like to come and have dinner with us on Friday ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Tomorrow ? No , I'm afraid I wouldn't be able to . I'm going out of the town on business .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sorry , I never go out on Saturday evening . I always watch football on Saturday evening .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Will you come round next Tuesday ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Next Tuesday ? Just a moment ! It will be the 21st of May . Oh , dear . Arm ... I promised my aunt I would be at her birthday party .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What do you say to next Wednesday then ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me see . Yes , Mary . Let's make it next Wednesday .
segments.speaker: S1
